# Public Finance & Regulation – Domain Overview

## Scope
The Public Finance & Regulation domain governs government-related financial
activities, fiscal controls, regulatory reporting obligations, and
public-sector financial compliance.

This domain represents legally binding financial authority and oversight.

## Characteristics
- Statute-driven behavior
- High transparency and accountability requirements
- Strong separation of powers and responsibilities
- Long-term retention and disclosure obligations

## Domain Authority
This domain is authoritative for:
- Public finance rules and constraints
- Regulatory financial frameworks
- Government reporting obligations
- Statutory compliance enforcement

Other domains must comply with this domain’s requirements
but must not reinterpret or bypass them.
